articles.title: Alexa, filmy dialogue sunao: Amazon reveals what Indians ask Alexa the most - India Today
articles.description: Amazon recently revealed what Indians ask Alexa the most. The list includes queries related to weather, Bollywood, songs, and most importantly, asking the voice assistant its personal preferences.

articles.author: BS Web Team
articles.title: Airtel Wynk music streaming app gets Dolby Atmos on Android, iOS: Details - Business Standard
articles.description: Wynk Music said that it would add music catalogue from Yash Raj Films (YRF), Saregama, and Phonographic Digital Limited (PDL) in Dolby Atmos format in eight languages
articles.content: The selection of compatible tracks in Dolby Atmos format will be available to Wynk Music subscribers free of cost (File)
